general_advisory: Complete transplanting of winter vegetable crops. Use low-cost polythene cover above the vegetable nursery to avoid poor germination due to low temperature. For early and maximum yield in cole crops spray Gibberellic Acid 0.001% L. Do proper field surveillance for pests and diseases regularly.

advisory: Rodent-If 'Rodent/Rats' problem is noticed, locate the rodent burrow in the crop field and surrounding areas. Place Aluminium Phosphide 6% tablet per burrow and seal the burrow with mud which will kill the rodents.
Tobacco Caterpillar-Collect and destroy egg mass and caterpillar of the pest. Monitor the emergence of adult moths by setting up Pheromone traps. Spray insecticides as needed.
Aphids and Thrips-For infestation, spray neem-based pesticide. Chemical sprays may also be used depending on the severity.
Diamond Back Moth-Install light traps per acre and spray neem-based pesticide for pest management.
November is the optimum time for planting dwarf variety banana. Use disease-free suckers for planting.
Make necessary arrangements to provide heat to chicks during night hours. Keep the poultry house clean and free of clamps.
